dmca.title: [ABUSE] RE: Final Notification- Unauthorized use of image or likeness
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 08, 2005 10:51 AM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] RE: Final Notification- Unauthorized use of image or
likeness]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Forwarding to Legal for review.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] RE: Final Notification- Unauthorized use of image or
likeness
Date: Sun, 5 Jun 2005 22:42:39 -0400
From: Omar Javaid <admin@ebiz-help.com>
To: <admin@ratedesi.com>
CC: mehreenmansur@hotmail.com, abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir or Madam,

The user who continues to post at http://www.ratedesi.com/view.php?i=111240
continues to steal pictures and further transgresses.  Please have the links
posted in my original email removed immediately to stop further action.

The user has posted pictures of Mehreen's younger sister who is 11 as well
as cartoon images which are in clear violation of your terms of service.

Again, we demand swift action on your part to stop the actions mentioned
above. We are completely comfortable with providing you with any type of
identification that you deem appropriate.

Be advised, this constitutes my final warning before legal action is pursued
tomorrow at 12:00pm noon.

Please respond with action as soon as possible.

Regards,

Omar Javaid
Repreentative
Biz Support Solutions


- -----Original Message-----
From: RateDesi.com [mailto:admin@ratedesi.com]
Sent: Saturday, June 04, 2005 1:29 PM
To: Omar Javaid
Subject: Re: Final Notification- Unauthorized use of image or likeness

I would like to see copies of previous emails or correspondance with me as I
believe there was none.

Anyway, for a picture to be removed there needs to be some proof that it is
fake. I don't see any proof in the following email.

- --- Omar Javaid <admin@ebiz-help.com> wrote:

| To Whom It May Concern:
|
|
|
| We have been retained by Ms. Mehreen Mansur in regard to the repeat 
| offenses by http://www.ratedesi.com <http://www.ratedesi.com/>
| (http://67.19.89.132/) and
| http://www.ratehispanic.com
| <http://www.ratehispanic.com/>
| (http://67.18.178.100
| <http://67.18.178.100/> ) of unauthorized use of image or likeness.  
| The images can be found at the below linked URL's:
|
|
|
| http://www.ratedesi.com/view.php?i=13214
|
| http://www.ratedesi.com/view.php?i=65646
| http://www.ratedesi.com/view.php?i=111240
|
| http://www.ratehispanic.com/view.php?i=101
|
|
|
| Over the span of three years, users from the above mentioned sites 
| have used images of our client to falsely misrepresent both her and 
| her brother in a variety of fraud ranging from marriage proposals to 
| modeling contracts.
| Consequently, Ms. Mansur's reputation has been slandered in the 
| tightly knit community in which she lives.  We have been in contact 
| with the U.S. Secret Service as well as the Federal Bureau of 
| Investigation local field offices which have advised us to approach 
| both the webmaster and the hosting provider before seeking police 
| action.
|
|
|
| Ms. Mansur has repeatedly attempted to have both the
| likeness of her and her
| brother removed from these sites by contacting the
| site administrator
| numerous times in the last three years.  At best,
| the site administrator was
| skeptical and belligerent and has ignored our
| requests on many occasions.
|
|
|
| We feel that ThePlanet.com as the hosting site
| should be the last line of
| defense against rogue actions of their customers.
|
|
|
| We have procured outside legal counsel to pursue
| this matter and obtain
| financial remedy in a court of law.  Our counsel has
| advised us to attempt
| to have the images removed through the organization
| which hosts the above
| named sites.
|
|
|
| If the images in question are not removed within 72
| hours, we will pursue
| legal action as the only remaining course.
|
|
|
| We are awaiting a swift and judicious response.
|
|
|
| Omar Javaid
|
| Representative
|
| Biz Support Solutions
|
|







- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

=pJF+
